data.title: Looney Tunes and Merrie Melodies Cartoon Resource Website entry #100

#100

LOONEY TUNES AND MERRIE MELODIES entry date: Dec 31, 2003 LOONEY TUNES AND MERRIE MELODIES original airdates: May 6, 1930-1969 number of cartoon shorts: 1002 animated by: Warner Bros.,
